TitleEnglish: Saint Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac
SummaryEnglish: Seiya and the Knights of the Zodiac rise again to protect the reincarnation of the goddess Athena, but a dark prophecy hangs over them all.

1.SummaryEnglish: After exhibiting special powers, Seiya is approached by the enigmatic Alman Kido, who urges him to fulfill his destiny and become a Bronze Knight.

2.SummaryEnglish: Seiya obtains the Pegasus Armor with ease, but to be a true Knight of Athena, he must first prove himself in the Galaxian Wars tournament.

3.SummaryEnglish: Believing in the dark prophecy, Magnus confronts Lady Sienna. Seiya faces his toughest opponent yet: Dragon Long.

4.SummaryEnglish: Reluctant to fight, Andromeda Shaun takes a defensive approach against Unicorn Jab using her Nebula Chain. Meanwhile, Vander's army attacks.

5.SummaryEnglish: Seiya takes down a helicopter to retrieve the stolen Gold Armor from Phoenix Nero, only to be confronted by Vander's Black Knights.

6.SummaryEnglish: Phoenix Nero has built up his overwhelming power with hate. To stop him, the Bronze Knights must combine their strength to reclaim the Gold Armor.

7.SummaryEnglish: Seiya awakens, having survived the collapsing volcano. He quickly learns Sanctuary has sent Silver Knight Misty and his old master Marin to kill him.

8.SummaryEnglish: Fearing for Sienna's safety, Marin orders Seiya to protect her. Alone, Marin faces the Silver Knights Hound Asterion and Whale Morris.

9.SummaryEnglish: Reunited with the Bronze Knights, Seiya and the others search for Sienna. Silver Knight Jamian the Crow appears, determined to stop them.

10.SummaryEnglish: Perseus Argol's Medusa Shield turns its opponents into stone. One of the Bronze Knights makes a life-altering decision to protect Sienna.

11.SummaryEnglish: Graad assembles his own Black Knights to protect mankind from the gods. When his forces abduct Sienna, the Bronze Knights set out to rescue her.

12.SummaryEnglish: The Bronze Knights face Graad's upgraded Black Knights. Though Seiya and the others gain the upper hand, Graad proves to be a formidable foe.

2.SummaryEnglish: The young warriors who protect the goddess Athena are known as the Knights of the Zodiac. One young orphan, Seiya, is destined to become the Pegasus Knight. Athena has been born into this world, but this time under a dark prophecy that she will lose the war against Poseidon and Hades, and lead mankind to ruin. Seiya stands up against the prophecy, willing to protect her at all cost. But now a god-killer arrow has struck her heart. To save her life, Seiya must ascend Sanctuary and defeat twelve legendary Gold Knights - and he only has twelve hours to do it. Will he make it? And what will happen to the dark prophecy if he succeeds?"

1.SummaryEnglish: Athena is attacked by a godslayer arrow and Seiya and company must fight against the Gold Knights to save her.

2.SummaryEnglish: Seiya faces Aldebaran in the House of Taurus to go ahead and save Athena, but his rival is really powerful.

3.SummaryEnglish: While Seiya and the others have trouble dealing with Gemini, the action also takes place on Andromeda Island.

4.SummaryEnglish: Shun confronts the Gemini Gold Knight while Hyoga mysteriously reappears before Camus, his former master.

5.SummaryEnglish: Shiryu goes ahead and arrives at the House of Cancer, where his corresponding Gold Knight is waiting for him ready to kill him.

6.SummaryEnglish: As Long seeks a way to defeat Cancer Deathmask, Seiya reaches the House of Leo where he is unexpectedly confronted by a former friend.

7.TitleEnglish: Battle for the House of Leo
7.SummaryEnglish: Already gripped in a life-and-death struggle against Gold Knight Leo Aiolia, Seiya is forced into even more danger when an archenemy returns.

8.SummaryEnglish: While Marin, Genet, Aldebaran, and Mu head for Star Hill, Seiya and the Bronze Knights find the path to the House of Virgo blocked by the Skull Knights.

9.SummaryEnglish: Marin, Genet, Aldebaran, and Mu begin to investigate Star Hill, and find unexpected danger at every turn.

10.TitleEnglish: The One as Powerful as a God
10.SummaryEnglish: Inside the House of Virgo, Seiya and the Bronze Knights face the powerful Gold Knight Shaka – with the help of an old acquaintance.

11.SummaryEnglish: Phoenix Nero fights a losing battle against Gold Knight Virgo Shaka. To have any chance of overcoming Shaka’s unlimited power, Nero must dig deep into his soul and face his own death.

12.SummaryEnglish: Time is running out for Sienna. While the Knights discover the identity of the true evil over Sanctuary, Seiya is locked in battle with Gold Knight Scorpio Milo.

1.SummaryEnglish: Seiya and his friends arrive at the House of Scorpio and engage in a deadly battle with the Gold Knight, Milo.

2.SummaryEnglish: Former rivals of the Bronze Knights, Jabu and the others come together to help the goddess Athena.

3.TitleEnglish: Return to the Land of the Dead
3.SummaryEnglish: Although there are four hours left before the god-killing arrow pierces her heart, Saori is on the brink of death. Meanwhile, Seiya meets Cleo, a mysterious woman who learns about Saori's crisis.

4.SummaryEnglish: Seiya and the other Bronze Knights encounter an unexpected enemy, Aiolos, the Gold Knight of Sagittarius. The four end up being transported to their respective training camps...

5.SummaryEnglish: Just as they pass through the House of Capricorn, Dragon Shiryu becomes separated from Seiya and his companions as a huge crack tears through the earth...

6.SummaryEnglish: Hyoga confronts his master, the Gold Knight of Aquarius, Camus, and challenges him to a battle for his life.

7.SummaryEnglish: Shun and Seiya arrive at the House of Pisces. There, Shun tells Seiya to move on, while he faces Aphrodite, the Gold Knight who killed his master Daedalus.

8.SummaryEnglish: In the House of Pisces, Andromeda Shaun continues her life-and-death battle against her master’s killer, Gold Knight Aphrodite. In the midst of the struggle, Shaun flashes back to the events in her past that molded her and made her who she is.

9.TitleEnglish: Death Match in the Grand Master’s Chambers
9.SummaryEnglish: Seiya is near-death, downed by the deadly Demon Roses. He must find a way to stay alive and survive as he nears his goal - to reach the Grand Master.

10.SummaryEnglish: As the final flame on the clock tower is about to burn out, Seiya confronts the Grand Master and discovers his shocking true identity. In the face of the Grand Master’s overwhelming power, Seiya must dig deep if he hopes for any chance of victory.

11.TitleEnglish: The Face of the Grand Master
11.SummaryEnglish: Phoenix Nero returns to join the battle against the Grand Master. The two battle as more secrets are revealed about the Grand Master’s fate. But as both Sienna and Seiya lie near-death, is it all too little too late?

12.SummaryEnglish: At the top of Sanctuary, time has almost run out and the epic battle is nearly ended. Now the fate of the universe hangs in the balance as Seiya makes one final desperate attempt to save Sienna.
